jobDescription: Participate in the design of optimal and efficient data architecture to deliver business data visualization for the organization. Plans and designs the processes for data migration to ensure data integrity and completeness. Assists in the development of database testing, and recommends acceptance upon completion. flowchartsActs as data expert by suggesting technologies, technology approaches, and processesLeads full life-cycle projects from requirements gathering through development, implementation and roll-outProvide insight into the changing database storage and utilization requirements for the company and offer suggestions for solutionsAnalyze database implementation methods to make sure they are in line with company policies and any external regulations that may applyCreate data monitoring models for each product and work with our marketing team to create models ahead of new releasesDevelop database design and architecture documentation for the management and executive teamsDeveloping database solutions to store and retrieve company informationInstalling and configuring information systems to ensure functionalityAnalyzing structural requirements for new software and applicationsDevelop database solutions to store and retrieve company informationMigrate data from legacy systems to new solutionsImprove system performance by conducting tests, troubleshooting and integrating new elementsOptimize new and current database systemsExperience&Background;:Eight (8) years of work experience in data environmentsFour (4) to six (6) years of overall technical project delivery experienceStrong data management related technical knowledge and delivery experience in the following areas:Database design and modeling (SQL Server, PostgreSQL, Oracle), can include NoSQL technologiesETL design and delivery (SQL Server Integration Services, Informatica)Reporting tool configuration, administration, and report development (SQL Server Reporting Services, Power BI, Tableau)Experience using cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, etc. Experience using PaaS BI services is a plus.Knowledge of standard methodologies, concepts, best practices, and procedures for a BI environment.Knowledge of data governance and master data management processes and procedures.
